alert.note: Alert for Casper Mountain; Natrona County, Casper BLM; Upper Wind River Basin, Wind River Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued August 26 at 1:52PM MDT until August 27 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH SATURDAY EVENING... * IMPACTS: Low relative humidity and gusty west wind will create erratic fire behavior and quickly spread new fire starts. * AFFECTED AREA: In Central WY...Fire Weather Zones 280...283...and 300. * COUNTIES AFFECTED: In Central WY...Fremont...Natrona. * WIND: West 15 to 20 mph with gusts 25 to 35 mph. * HUMIDITY: 11 to 14 percent.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.

area.areaDesc: Casper Mountain; Natrona County, Casper BLM; Upper Wind River Basin, Wind River Basin
